Trade/Device Name(s): AgaMatrix Jazz Wireless 2 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AgaMatrix Jazz Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): AgaMatrix Jazz Wireless 2 Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AgaMatrix Jazz Wireless 2 Blood Glucose Monitoring System for self-monitoring blood glucose using capillary whole blood from fingertip.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of blood glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
